content.detailedDescription: just happened to glance out window and see what ifirst thought was the moon. then noticed that it couldnt be, because there were2 sources of light. left room to get glasses, gone when came back. then, as istared at the clouds, two large, white lights turned-on (as though by a switch)above clouds again! they were side by side without a lot of distance between. iwas transfixed for about five minutes or longer, as they were stationary, andtoo big to be anything i could think of. then the one on the left, withinseconds, reconfigured its shape and was gone-didnt move, just went out. withinabout 30 seconds, the one on the right-which did not dim or changeshape-blinked-out as well. i returned to the window a number of times in thenext two hours, but saw nothing else. oh, and as for height, it was within theatmosphere-not near high enough to be a satellite. never seen anything like it!
content.summary: Two lights above clouds over willamette river at n

content.detailedDescription: I was in an park called leidse hout, on the border of the cities of leiden enoegstgeest in holland, with three friends. we were watching the sky for shootingstars, as one of us noticed a satelite flying. in order to see more satelties,we became very alert . tehn suddenly, we saw a formation of three lights flying.Now what makes us think they werent satelites? three things: a) they werethree, flying in formation b) ive seen many satelites, but neve one so faintand therefore high above the earth, and c), which is the hardest evidence: theselights were flying in one direction, i think it was se, for more then fiveminutes. as they approached the horizon, they appeared to be flying closertogether. this may mean two things: either they broke formation, but as far as iknow, satelites never do, or, it means they were flying horizontaly, and not, assatelites do, on a steady distance of the earth-surface, in other words,following the curve of the earth. when we first saw the formation it was likethis5b. .5d later like this5b:.5d. please have a dutch(-speaking) member of your organization e-mail me, sothat i can report more acurately in my own language.
content.summary: 3 flying objects in horizontal flight
I wittnesed a black triangle making a humming nois

content.detailedDescription: I first saw it on sat.Aug 31st at about 9:30 then agian on sun sept 1st sametime it,done different things both times.It hovered in the distance at least amile away,it looked like a ball flashing from off white to red.As if it werespinning,at times it was more red.It just hovered there,then after about 15minuts it faded out.Then it reapered in another spot not far from where it wasto begin w/.But this time it was lower.A long way off but u could c it just overthe tree tops.Then it seemed to get futher and futher away slowly.Watched itabout an hour both times.
content.summary: Hovered light flashed red/white faded in/out moved

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were outside of our home playing when we noticed a light movingin the sky. we wondered what it was so we watched it for a while it was movingeast. the as fast as a bullet it tuned up  and headed north straght up thestopped. as we watched it it begain to pulse like a light bulb going out. i toldmy brother to go get a camera but when i said that this red light shot down atleast 1 mile and stopped over our heads. this thing was still way above us butwecould not move. then it was headed straght up and gone out of site in about 3sec.
content.summary: Saw a red ball of light
Saw small orange spheres near car , then ufos in t
Large star like object hovered over area w/varying

content.detailedDescription: well there has been a few sightings the one listedabove was the most dramatic.  like billy meirs ship disc with 3 bulbs on thebottom all different colors.  from my perspective it just appeared thendissapeared.Also at same local saw a ball of plazma and many other things.
content.summary: 3 balls of lights green red orange in a circular w

content.detailedDescription: I happened to be sitting in the backyard over at my parents house and looked upin the air while finishing a can of soda. it was then that i saw the dot in thesky. at first i thought that it was just a balloon that had escaped from somecar lot or such, but though the clouds around it and above it were moving, theobject remained static. i watched it for about 20-30 seconds, and then asked myfather to go into the house to get his binocularsi maintained eye contact so as not to lose sight of it. he returned with thebinoculars and i examined the object through them and was able to tell that itwas round and metallic, appearing a golden color presumably from the sunsreflection. i then gave my father the binoculars and he saw the object too. weasked my mother to come back for a third opinion and while she was coming back,the object simply vanished. we have seen this sort of object before, and imyself have witnessed over a half-dozen objects of various sizes and shapes andbehavior over the last 15 years since moving to san diego, but this is the mostrecent one. feel free to contact me about more details, but be prepared to leavea message on our answering machine, as we screen our calls and work odd hours.If you do call and have to leave a message, please leave your name and contactinfo/time to contact you so that i can return your call.
content.summary: A spherical shape, golden in color, very shiny, ho
Large triangle small lights flying around
Daylight observation of low flying metallic object

content.detailedDescription: I was getting a ride home from penfield to rochester by girlfriend i notice whati thought was an airplane at first the lights (3) were so bright as when planesare landing i has to look at it and relize it was not moving and there was noairport it seemed to just be hovering i did report to peter davenports sitenotice i was not the only one that saw something that night
content.summary: Lights
Large red and orange round ball

content.detailedDescription: my friends and i were hanging out in ap parkinglot,around7-8pm. i first spotted it in the sky and mentioned it to everybody. atfirst we thought it was a satellite or plane or something. but(this is when wegot the chills) the object(a rapidly flashing ball of yellow orange light)started changing speed and course! it spun around, moved in directions noplane,bird,weather balloon could ever have done. the grand finale was it shotdown, then moved to the right(in the shape of an l),shot back in the oppositedirection, and just blinked out.I will never forget that night.
content.summary: Flashing light moving and spinning

content.detailedDescription: Cheyenne was watching t.V. bobby and chris got cheyenne to look at lights. sammycame out and the lights went away. she went back in and the strange craft cameout. we felt like something was watching us through the window. cheyenne wasskeptical and logical, bobby jumped to the ufo conclusion. the object was awhite cigar. it flew north, came down, went up, south, accended, came down,south, and dissapeared. it accended north and disappeared.
content.summary: Flashing lights,white cigar craft.T.V. and radio m

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way for lunch about 11:30 today, and i was noticed by a siverdisc-liked object in the sky. i was noticed because it is reflected by the sun.It moves like a fallen-leaf, and it hovered over the sky of manhattan for about15 minutes. then it disappeared in the colud. the object is lower than thecommercial air-line because when i saw it, i also saw the airplane.
content.summary: A disc-liked silver object hover over the sky of m
Rotating orange flaming balls that shoot smaller o

content.detailedDescription: I would like to report a ufo sighting that my wife and i both had on the nightof 04/23/02.At about 00:30 i took the dogs out for their midnight run. i do this everynight. we live on thirty five wooded acres in st.Charles mi, exactly one milewest of ____ on _______ rd. it was a clear night for looking at stars etc. wheni looked to the north west i saw a very bright star-like object moving wildly;but staying in the same general area. i watched this cylinder shaped objectmoving for at least five minutes. i then ran into the house to get my wife tomake sure i was seeing what i thought i was seeing. i was, she saw it too! shewatched it for a few moments and then retired to the house. she isnt veryinterested in ufos.  after watching this object together she went in and icontinued scanning the skys for anything elce. at this point i saw two moreobjects moving, but several miles to the north and south of the one we were bothwatching. i stayed outside with the dogs moving to several different areas onthe property to see if i could get a better look at the objects to the north andsouth of the main object. i usually carry a large flashlight with me when i walkthe dogs, and i had one that night. i was 100 yards away from the house when ilet go with a burst of three flashes toward the object in front of me. i didthis several times in the hope that they would perhaps flash back. this went onfor about ten minutes without any responce from the object in front of me. iwould guess this thing to be maybe 1-2 miles up in front of me, but there was noway to tell as i had no idea of what its size was supposed to be. out of nowhere a huge brilliant, shimmering circluar object came in at me from the southof this object. it came in at tree top level, and it was huge! it had to be thesize of a two story house. it was dead quiet, it didnt make a sound! it didlight up the surounding area however. before i even flashed the light i had madup my mind that if things went bad, i would run as fast as i could to try andreach the house. this is exactly what i did! it scared me so bad that to thisday whenever i take the dogs out at night, i dont stray too far from the door. iam always scanning the sky to make sure i know what is around before i even moveaway from the house.  there was no doubt in my mind that this "craft" was aboutto abduct me from the property. if i haddent been ready before hand i belive itwould have nailed me for dead sure! i ran so fast that i beat both dogs to thehouse who were also running when i screamed run!!! if i had owned a video camerai would have the best ufo footage, i have ever seen to be sure; and perhaps thebest footage ever. the craft that came in at me in my direction first apeared to me to have been nofuther than 1000 feet due south and about 1500 to 2000 feet due west, no futherthan 100 feet up. later checking the distance in the day light i found thisestimate to be very close. how i was luckey enough to have had a split second toescape from this thing i will never know. it must of misjudged my where-aboutsas it wasnt the craft i was watching overhead. in concluding this sighting iremember that the main object seemed to change shapes at times. if it wasntchanging shapes then it must have been doing something in its manuvers to appearto do so. at times it looked like two cylinderical shaped objects side by side,and then at other times it looked as if it were three cylinderical shapedobjects in the shape of a triangle. very strange. i tried to call the st.Charlespolice dept. to get someone out here to see it when it was happening but i gotno answer after several calls. i called my dad and told him what happened. mydad then called the sherrifs dept. and reported to them what i had seen, theirresponce to him was that they have had several reports of ufos out here. hetold me they totally believed him; which makes me feel good. in closing i willstate that i have seen very many ufos out here since my wife and myself movedout here in 1987. this however was one of the best sightings i have ever had.Two years ago my next door negihbor  and i had a day time sighting of a verylarge classic silver disc moving totally without any sound . the duration ofthis sighting was perhaps 30 seconds.  after i had the 04/23/02 sighting i wasunable to sleep the whole night, since that night i have watched from three tofive ufos every night; up to and including last night when i saw five craftmoving in the north west sky. these things always seem to be around. i believethis area out here would be a very good area to have someone from yourorganization come out and investigate. if you guys are interested please let meknow, i am retired and stay up most of the night anyway. maybe we could get somereal good documentation of what i believe is a real ufo hotspot in michigan. ifiled one report with www.Ufocenter.Com , other than that i have never filed areport or called anyone to make a report on a ufo. other than the fact that youcan usually see ufos on a regular basis out here , when you do see craft; thesightings are of usually very long duration. many times you can watch ufos outhere from dusk until dawn. i wish i had the money to purchase a video camera, iwill now for sure get one asap!
content.summary: I was watching a large star like object in st.Char

content.detailedDescription: the object is saw was simply a rapidly travellingsphere, silver in color, approximately three feet in diameter. it was travellingperhaps 80-90 mph, maybe a little more. it couldnt have been more than 40 feetoff the ground travelling in a beeline through my suburban neighborhood. i sawit briefly, perhaps for about 3 seconds as it raced through the subdivision.This is the first one of these i have ever seen, but i have seen ufo craft onthree separate occasions, dating back to 1973 in key west florida
content.summary: A low flying orb shaped projectile, travelling per

content.detailedDescription: We were in my backyard. blinking light. aircraft. slight fear then calmness. itwas a round object that was blinking red, green, blue, and white. it looked likea star are first then it started blinking. there was only one but then we say 3more appeared.It was hovering staying in the same spot from 1:50 to about3:00a.M.  it faded out.
content.summary: Lights hovering for about an hour.

content.detailedDescription: We were on the deck at night when i looked up and saw a very bright light.  itwas brighter than a star, plane or satellite.  i asked my sister if she saw ittoo.  she did, and we watched it move from very bright to very faint and finallydisappear.  it was all in an upward motion (that was to the north).  right afterthat one disappeared, we saw another bright light that did the same thing as thefirst, only in a different direction (still upwards).  we saw a satellite fly byright after the second sigting, and it was not of the same nature.  it wasdefinelty something we have not seen before.  for the past month, we have alsobeen seeing strange objects in the sky during the day.  they are very high inthe sky and seem to hover.  they dont really move and are very metallic.  theare pencil shaped and appear to be a silver metal color.  at each sighting,there was more than one person witnessing them.  on one occasion, the pencilshaped sighting disapeared like the lights did tonight.
content.summary: 2 bright lights that moved upwards and disappeared
Strange light across maine sky
Moving lights

content.detailedDescription: i was driving s.E. on stoney hill road, yardley,pa when i saw a hat shapped ufo moving from east to west at 17.33 hours edst. the craft was a strange white tranlucent color with the dome not in proportionto the disc. the craft had a slight tilt (nose down) while moving in a straightline east to west.I knew immediatly that this was a ufo, my first words wereholy s--t i cant belive what i just saw.  as i was driving and looking at thecraft a stand of trees started to block my view so i sped up to pass the treesand the craft was gone. sorry i dont know my lat or long. at this time, howeveri will find it out.
content.summary: Hat shapped ufo, white translucent in color, 300 t
Saw dark oval object with lights on its surface

content.city: On Big Star Lake, near Ba
content.detailedDescription: I was fishing in a rowboat with my two daughters before, during and after thesighting.  we were fishing in big star lake.  big star lake is along the southedge of lake county.  the boat was anchored about 150 from the north shore.  wedid not experience any strange sensations.  my reaction was, "thats reallyweird."  since we were on vacation, i hadnt had a chance to contact anyone. the following is a more detailed description obtained by rich mcvannel viatelephone:the sighting occured at approximately 8:45 pm.  ___ and his daughters werefishing on the north end of big star lake, near baldwin.  while fishing theyheard a noise to the north and looked and viewed a military jet flying and theydidnt think anything of it, as the planes from grayling air national guard basefly over that area all the time.  when they saw what it was, they watched it fora few moments and they turned back to the south tofish more and noticed a "white cylindrical object" due south from their positionat some distance away.  as they watched this new object, the object moved south,slow at first and then "zipped away" southerly and disappeared.  it exhibitednot sound and no exhaust, it was very bright and then it was gone.About ten minutes later, the object reappeared a little closer this time, satstill momentarily and then "zipped" off to the south and disappeared again. about ten minutes later, again, the object reappears closer this time.  ___figures about 1 1/4 miles south of the south shore of big star lake.  this timethe object flashes and looks larger and then developes into a bright "sphere"shape ("looked like a ball and then back to the cylinder shape"), and thecylinder appeared to be rolling counter-clockwise moving away from them.  theobject was so bright that he thought it was the sun glaring off of it, but thesun had gone down by this time and they were viewing it in the lighter eveningsky before darkness fell.  while the object was rolling, it appeared to have adark spot in themiddle of it and also, when it changed back to the cylinder shape it looked likea canoe, "you know, with both ends turned up".  (digital drawings included withreport).  in other words the object was rolling like a log and the black spotappeared in the middle of the rolling cylinder, as seen in the drawings.  theobject kept rolling south and disappeared like before.  they followed it withtheir eyes until the bright little dot of what was left of it in the distance,disappeared.What was most outstanding about the object was the fact that it didnt have any"crisp edges".  the edges always appeared fuzzy and never clear.The primary adult witness doesnt wear glasses, has good sight.  his onedaughter has corrected vision with glasses.  the adult witness is a tv producer/director.
content.summary: Cylindrical object sighted 3 times
content.locationName: On Big Star Lake, near Ba, Michigan

content.detailedDescription: i was a security guard at north fork resort. atapprox. 0200 i was making a check of the grounds and entered a buildinguponexiting the building i felt a strange silence and then noticed a blue pulsatinglight at eye level to my right, then a green pulsating light in front of me,then a red light to my left at which time i jumped into my vehicle and droveapprox. 100 yards away and turned to look back and there was nothing.Since thisevent i feel that these lights may have been hypnotic because myvehicle was onlyten feet away and i dont remember seeing my vehicle until after looking intothe red lightat app
content.summary: I was surrounded by three lights,at eye level to m

content.detailedDescription: A group of friends and i were sitting on our front porch talking, when i noticedan object decending at about a 45 degree angle, heading north.  the ball waswhite in color, then turned blue, then back to white before disappearing overthe horizon of buildings.  the next door neighbors also saw this occurance.  weended up talking about it for quite some time, as we found it quite interesting.
content.summary: Saw fast decending blue/white ball in sky

content.detailedDescription: wife and i went on back patio to sit.  looked upand noticed four strong lights above or in the clouds.  the four formed asquare...With the farther lights being closer than the near lights.  no movementobserved for about an hour. i went inside and got camera.  took anumber ofphotos of varying exposures.  we noticed a beam of light coming from a couple ofthe lights aimed at the ground. lights can be seen in some photos.  no noise, nomovement.  a haze was seen around the lights.  they were north of our location. the partial moon could be seen to our east.
content.summary: Saw four lights form square near wilmington, n.C.
